Package de.tum.cit.ase.maze

package de.tum.cit.ase.maze
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Character
    The Character class represents the player's character in the game.
    Coin
    The Coin class represents a coin in the game.
    Enemy
    The Enemy class represents an enemy character in the game.
    ExitPoint
    The ExitPoint class represents an exit point in the maze.
    GameOverScreen
    The GameOverScreen class represents the screen displayed when the game is over (victory or defeat).
    GameScreen
    The GameScreen class is responsible for rendering the gameplay screen.
    HUD
    The HUD (Heads-Up Display) class handles the display of essential game information such as remaining lives and keys collected.
    Key
    The Key class represents a key that can be collected in the game.
    MapSelectionScreen
    The MapSelectionScreen class represents the screen where players can select a game map.
    MazeRunnerGame
    The MazeRunnerGame class represents the core of the Maze Runner game.
    MenuScreen
    The MenuScreen class is responsible for displaying the main menu of the game.
    Trap
    The Trap class represents a trap in the game.
    Wall
    The Wall class represents a wall in the game.
